Text: Re Aether Systems IncorporatedPlease could you review the modifications that Aether are requesting to the NDA and let me know if this is acceptable Thanks Teresa Forwarded by Teresa SmithCorpEnron on AM Joseph Gatto on AM To cc Evan Deoul Bill Hannon Subject NDA modification Hello Teresa It was good talking with you earlier I look forward to working with you on this exciting partnership I just received this slight modification to the NDA from our legal group Please advise if these changes are acceptable on your side and we can turn around today Enron NDA Changedoc Thanks much Joseph D Gatto Director of Sales Financial Systems Division Aether Systems Inc Cronridge Drive Owings Mills Maryland Phone x Fax Cell Email Enron NDA Changedoc

Outercurve Technologies Request for EOL NDAPlease can you forward a copy of the EOL NDA to Alexandria Khalil at Outercurve Technologies Please can you advise when you have received a signed copy Thanks Teresa

Re Outercurve Technologies Request for EOL NDAwill endevour to get you this information this afternoon Teresa From Tana CT on PM To Teresa NRON cc Subject Re Outercurve Technologies Request for EOL NDA To prepare an NDA for you I will need the following information The correct legal name of the counterparty Whether the agreement is bilateral both parties providing confidential information or oneway where only Enron is providing confidential information Our preference is to use the Enron protected party form since it is written more in our favor The nature andor use of the information being provided The address of the counterparty The phone and fax number of the counterparty Once I have all this I can prepare your NDA in short order Teresa NRON AM To Tana CT cc Subject Outercurve Technologies Request for EOL NDA Tana Please can you forward a copy of the EOL NDA to Alexandria Khalil at Outercurve Technologies Please can you advise when you have received a signed copy Thanks Teresa

Re Outercurve Technologies Request for EOL NDAHere is the information you require Outercurve Technologies Inc The company has already requested a bilateral agreement Disclosing information regarding intention to place EOL on a hand held device Wood Avenue Suite Iselin NJ Phone Fax Teresa From Tana CT on PM To Teresa NRON cc Subject Re Outercurve Technologies Request for EOL NDA To prepare an NDA for you I will need the following information The correct legal name of the counterparty Whether the agreement is bilateral both parties providing confidential information or oneway where only Enron is providing confidential information Our preference is to use the Enron protected party form since it is written more in our favor The nature andor use of the information being provided The address of the counterparty The phone and fax number of the counterparty Once I have all this I can prepare your NDA in short order Teresa NRON AM To Tana CT cc Subject Outercurve Technologies Request for EOL NDA Tana Please can you forward a copy of the EOL NDA to Alexandria Khalil at Outercurve Technologies Please can you advise when you have received a signed copy Thanks Teresa

Re OuterCurve Technologies Inc Cc working with both Outercurve Technologies and Aether Systems on the wireless project I have requested proposals from both by close of business tomorrow Teresa Louise CT AM To Tana CT cc Dave CT Julie CT Rahil CT Bob CT Michael CT Kal CT Daniel CT David nron Teresa nron Subject Re OuterCurve Technologies Inc Anybody claiming this one From Tana Jones on To Dave CT Julie CT Rahil CT Bob CT Louise CT Michael CT Kal CT Daniel CT David nron Teresa nron cc Subject OuterCurve Technologies Inc We have received the executed Confidentiality Agreement with the referenced Counterparty dated June Copies will be be sent Dave Samuels and Teresa Smith

Aether Systems NDAAether Systems have asked that we review and sign copies of their NDA See instructions below Please can you make sure this is forwarded to the appropriate individuals Thanks Teresa Forwarded by Teresa SmithCorpEnron on AM Ron Sullivan on PM To cc Joseph Gatto Subject Enron MOU Hello Teresa Pursuant to our recent conversations attached please find a Memorandum of Understanding The MOU includes the list of questions upon which Aether would like clarification I am also including a copy of our Standard Nondisclosure Agreement Please have a look at both and let me know what you think Please note that the MOU lists Louise Kitchen as a ccd party I did not cc her myself I will leave that to you As for the NDA can you please have copies signed by the appropriate parties and mail them to the attention of David Buehler General Counsel Aether Systems Inc Cronridge Drive Owings Mills Maryland We will execute both and return one signed copy to you Lets try and talk late tomorrow I can be reached at the number below but I will be working a Trade Show most of the day so please leave a message if you dont get me Otherwise I will try you after the show breaks around PM ET Thank you Ron MOU doc NDAdraftdocdoc Ron Sullivan Regional Sales Manager Aether Systems Inc AETH Phone Fax Email Pager MOU doc NDAdraftdocdoc

Re Aether Systems IncorporatedPlease could you review the modifications that Aether are requesting to the NDA and let me know if this is acceptable Thanks Teresa Forwarded by Teresa SmithCorpEnron on AM Joseph Gatto on AM To cc Evan Deoul Bill Hannon Subject NDA modification Hello Teresa It was good talking with you earlier I look forward to working with you on this exciting partnership I just received this slight modification to the NDA from our legal group Please advise if these changes are acceptable on your side and we can turn around today Enron NDA Changedoc Thanks much Joseph D Gatto Director of Sales Financial Systems Division Aether Systems Inc Cronridge Drive Owings Mills Maryland Phone x Fax Cell Email Enron NDA Changedoc

Aether Systems NDAAether Systems have asked that we review and sign copies of their NDA See instructions below Please can you make sure this is forwarded to the appropriate individuals Thanks Teresa Forwarded by Teresa SmithCorpEnron on AM Ron Sullivan on PM To cc Joseph Gatto Subject Enron MOU Hello Teresa Pursuant to our recent conversations attached please find a Memorandum of Understanding The MOU includes the list of questions upon which Aether would like clarification I am also including a copy of our Standard Nondisclosure Agreement Please have a look at both and let me know what you think Please note that the MOU lists Louise Kitchen as a ccd party I did not cc her myself I will leave that to you As for the NDA can you please have copies signed by the appropriate parties and mail them to the attention of David Buehler General Counsel Aether Systems Inc Cronridge Drive Owings Mills Maryland We will execute both and return one signed copy to you Lets try and talk late tomorrow I can be reached at the number below but I will be working a Trade Show most of the day so please leave a message if you dont get me Otherwise I will try you after the show breaks around PM ET Thank you Ron MOU doc NDAdraftdocdoc Ron Sullivan Regional Sales Manager Aether Systems Inc AETH Phone Fax Email Pager MOU doc NDAdraftdocdoc

Option Manager Screen Layoutdocument below details the screens that will be available within the Option Manager application The web client will present option products in a similar manner to that found within the Strikes Grid in the Option Manager application Applied Volatility Status and Id will not be presented on the web client The grid will be laid out as follows on the web US Gas Fin Option Nymex European Nov Strike Put Call Bid Vol Bid Premium Offer Premium OfferVol Bid Vol Bid Premium Offer Premium OfferVol Teresa
